docs.snippet: Conceding three penalties to Liverpool at Old Trafford would have usually triggered a furore among Manchester United fans, players and management under any other circumstances but for the humiliating manner in which they lost Sunday's derby....
docs.lead_paragraph: Conceding three penalties to Liverpool at Old Trafford would have usually triggered a furore among Manchester United fans, players and management under any other circumstances but for the humiliating manner in which they lost Sunday's derby.

docs.snippet: Borussia Dortmund's notoriously hot-tempered coach Juergen Klopp has barred fans from watching the team train this week as he seeks a calm lead-up to the side's Champions League Round of 16 second leg tie against Zenit St Petersburg on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund's notoriously hot-tempered coach Juergen Klopp has barred fans from watching the team train this week as he seeks a calm lead-up to the side's Champions League Round of 16 second leg tie against Zenit St Petersburg on Wednesday.

headline.main: Fiery Klopp Keeping Cool Ahead of Zenit Clash

docs.snippet: Wayne Rooney said Sunday was “one of the worst days I’ve ever had in football” as Manchester United, the defending champions in the English Premier League, lost 3-0 to Liverpool at home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney said Sunday was “one of the worst days I’ve ever had in football” as Manchester United, the defending champions in the English Premier League, lost 3-0 to Liverpool at home.
docs.abstract: Soccer Roundup; Liverpool defeats Manchester United, 3-0, and Arsenal defeats Tottenham, 1-0, capitalizing on rare loss by Premiere League leader Chelsea to tighten an intriguing four-team race for the title; other news noted.

headline.main: Premier League Tightens at Top, but United Drops to a New Low

docs.snippet: Bill Self was born in Edmond, Okla. He played basketball at Oklahoma State, and cut his teeth in the coaching profession at Kansas. He built up programs at Oral Roberts and Tulsa, and is now leading the Jayhawks in their pursuit of another nationa...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bill Self was born in Edmond, Okla. He played basketball at Oklahoma State, and cut his teeth in the coaching profession at Kansas. He built up programs at Oral Roberts and Tulsa, and is now leading the Jayhawks in their pursuit of another national championship.

headline.main: Hotbed of College Hoops Rest in Heartland

docs.snippet: For those at the low end of the hourly wage scale, even meeting basic household needs can be a stretch, and roads out of poverty are scarce....
docs.lead_paragraph: For those at the low end of the hourly wage scale, even meeting basic household needs can be a stretch, and roads out of poverty are scarce.
docs.abstract: Workers at low end of hourly wage scale are finding it easier to fall into poverty, and finding it harder to meet even basic household needs and to escape poverty; nearly 25 million workers in United States make less than $10.10 an hour, amount to which Pres Obama supports increasing minimum wage.

headline.main: Low-Wage Workers Are Finding Poverty Harder to Escape

docs.snippet: Mr. Porter, a self-taught adventurer and climate scientist, was most famous for the climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park in the early 1970s....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Porter, a self-taught adventurer and climate scientist, was most famous for the climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park in the early 1970s.
docs.abstract: Charlie Porter, self-taught mountaineer and climate scientist who became most famous for climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park, dies at age 63.

headline.main: Charlie Porter, an Adventurer Scaling Rock and Sailing Seas, Is Dead at 63
headline.print_headline: Charlie Porter, 63, a Solitary Adventurer Who Reshaped the Ascent of a Monolith
